messages.content: ComfyUI_DiT is a platform built to test the DiT model on. It is not a stable platform and is subject to breaking changes.
What should users expect from using ComfyUI_DiT?
Users should expect instability as none of the code for ComfyUI_DiT is stable. Breaking changes are likely to occur.
Is any of the code for ComfyUI_DiT based on an existing platform?
Yes, a lot of the code for ComfyUI_DiT is based on the original Meta repository.
Is there a license for the code used in ComfyUI_DiT?
Yes, the license for the original Meta repository code included in ComfyUI_DiT can be found under `LICENSE-DiT`.
